title: [CY] Enter the dates when you can't go to a hearing
titleEdit: [CY] Enter a date you can't go to a hearing

datePicker.itsImportant: [CY] It’s important that you make yourself available for a hearing. If you don’t show up, the appeal could go ahead in your absence or be delayed by several months.

nonJS.itsImportant: [CY] It’s important that you make yourself available for a hearing. If you postpone or don’t show up, your appeal could go ahead in your absence or be delayed by several months.
nonJS.yourHearing: [CY] Your hearing will take some time to book so only enter dates between 4 and 22 weeks in the future. Don’t include weekends or bank holidays.

error.allRequired: [CY] Enter the date you can't attend
error.dayRequired: [CY] Enter the day from the date you can't attend
error.monthRequired: [CY] Enter the month from the date you can't attend
error.yearRequired: [CY] Enter the year from the date you can't attend
error.underFourWeeks: [CY] Only enter dates at least 4 weeks in the future
error.overTwentyTwoWeeks: [CY] Only enter dates up to 22 weeks in the future
error.weekend: [CY] Enter a date that is not a weekend
error.bankHoliday: [CY] Enter a date that is not a bank holiday
